patthana14.3:1.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:1.1_1: Hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:1.1_2: Hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:2.1_0: Hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:2.1_1: Hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:2.1_2: Hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:3.1_0: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:3.1_1: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:3.1_2: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
